day1.title: Magnetic Profile

day1.step1: Add at least 3 high-quality photos of yourself
day1.step3: Choose what attracts you in others (max 2)

completion.title: Great job!

completion.title: Amazing progress!

day3.step2: Watch 3 Stories from people you find attractive
day3.step3: Add your first availability to the calendar (optional)
day3.step4: Save one event or add to wishlist (optional)
